DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether the drug BG00012 can improve the symptoms of rheumatoid arthritis (RA) in patients who are already taking methotrexate for RA, but who still suffer symptoms of RA. The purpose is also to ensure that the combination of methotrexate is safe for patients to take and that any side effects are acceptable to patients with RA.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of BG00012 With Methotrexate in Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: The study is a double-blind, placebo-controlled study of BG00012 plus methotrexate, versus methotrexate alone, in patients with active RA, who have had an incomplete response to other conventional disease modifying anti-rheumatic (DMARD) therapy.
